package.name: particle-filter-ros2
package.description: CSC 591 Project 3 Deliverable 1: motion and sensor models for particle-filter localization. After untarring into the root of a ROS 2 workspace, run `colcon build --packages-select particle-filter-ros2`, source `install/setup.bash`, then launch the full Gazebo demonstration with `ros2 launch particle-filter-ros2 main.launch` (spawns TurtleBot3 house world and both nodes) or launch only the motion/sensor nodes via `ros2 launch particle-filter-ros2 models.launch.py`. This package is adapted from the course starter repository (peng-lab/particle-filter-ros2) with project-specific modifications.
